and changes to the texture and runes to save time...time for my RL :D

Installation:

Copy meshes + textures folder & Nokkelen.esp to your Skyrim\\data directory.

The folder-structure should look like:
... Skyrim\
descriptionHtml:
Nøkkelen (weapon type: 1h+2h sword)

Had to modify it a bit, darker colors so they don\'t get white when reflecting sunlight
and changes to the texture and runes to save time...time for my RL :D

Installation:

Copy meshes + textures folder & Nokkelen.esp to your Skyrim\\data directory.

The folder-structure should look like:
... Skyrim\\data\\meshes\\weapons\\NOKKELEN\\ ALL NIF FILES
... Skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\NOKKELEN\\ ALL DDS FILES
... Skyrim\\data\\NOKKELEN.esp

Make sure that the plugin is activated in launcher => DATA FILES.
The weapon is placed in the forge-menu along with the dwarven items.

OR open console (key ^) and enter HELP KKELEN 4
You get a code, after that enter PLAYER.ADDITEM CODE 1
(1 = amount) - the weapon will be placed in your inventory.

(Code should look like XX000D63, XX= the load number of the mod, for example PLAYER.ADDITEM 12000D63 1)

Damage should scale with your skills/lvl and is similar to the Daedric Greatsword, if you want to adjust the dmg open the Creation Kit,
LOAD, check SKYRIM.ESM and NOKKELEN.ESP in the left window, set NOKKELEN.ESP to ACTIVE FILE and
press OK. In the object window check ITEMS and WEAPONS, search for NOKKELEN and open the found form,
adjust the dmg/speed values in this window, press OK and SAVE.

Credits: 

Thanks to Brendan Olszowy for his permission to use his designs 
and images, 
check out his awesome site: www.fableblades.com

greetings
Ghosu
author: Ghosu
